question: Which among the following articles of Constitution of India makes provisions for reservation of seats for SC and ST in Lok Sabha?
explanation: Article 330 (1) says - Seats shall be reserved in the House of the People for â€” (a) the Scheduled Castes; (b) the Scheduled Tribes except the Scheduled Tribes in the autonomous districts of Assam; and (C) the Scheduled Tribes in the autonomous districts of Assam.
